author: IRS
comment: I bought this app thinking it will translate to French (which the app states it does). When I talk into my moto360 wear device it just repeats the word in English! Can the dev's help resolve this?
title: Only translates to English on moto 360

author: Bill Perrotta
comment: Only works with voice I have minuum keyboard. Works well from English but I need both ways. Uninstalling for now

reply.author: AllAboutEE
reply.content: Yes, all of this was listed in the description.

title: Blows only works English to other language

author: Mike Young
comment: Great when traveling and you just need a simple phrase translated. Would love to see a text-version of the translation too, like google translate does on the phone.
title: Does exactly what it says

author: Jonathan Williams
comment: Great to see a translate app for wear! Works well, looking forward to further development of the app. Maybe a text readout on the watch. Worth the dollar!

author: Grant kay
comment: A babble fish in your phone!
title: Unbelievable!

author: Deshi Wu
comment: after the update, it works very well on my moto 360. thanks.

reply.author: AllAboutEE
reply.content: I just fixed it, thanks for letting me know. I just got my moto 360 today so I didn't know this was happening. You were right, the screen was blank but after the update it now works in my 360 also.

title: support moto 360 nicely now.

author: Matthew Dumas
comment: Anything I say it just reads it out in English.  Please fix.  Would be great if it worked as it should.

reply.author: AllAboutEE
reply.content:
Am sorry that this is happening, I'll do what I can. Does the app in the phone show the language you want to translate to as available? Do you say [words] " to " [language] exactly? 

Edit: I've also posted a video https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wbvWFXSbmJE with some sample phrases and usage cases.

title: English

author: Marcus Muehlbauer
comment: Would be nice to see translated word on watch instead of a voice from the phone. I switched back to "ok google": Translate blabla to whatever language and it works as well.
title: Hmm
